title: Path Finder v. 5.8.1 [K]racked
description:
Official Web Site: <a href=" http://www.macupdate.com/app/mac/6371/path-finder" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.macupdate.com/app/mac/6371/path-finder</a>

Path Finder is a file browser that combines the familiar Finder interface with the powerful utilities and innovative features.

Just a small selection of the Path Finder 5 feature set:

* Dual pane file browser

* Tabs to quickly manage multiple locations on your hard drive in one
  window

* Reorder how your files are listed to suit your personal preferences

* View invisible files and navigate inside of Mac OS X packages
  quickly and easily

* Access your frequently used folders, files, and applications with the
  Shelf, and save multiple Shelf setups to suit different activities

* Pause drag-and-drop operations by putting files into the Drop Stack
  for future use

* Create and convert disk images

* Access the OS X command line

What's New

* Fixed SMB share discovery in 10.7 Lion.

* New version of the Stuffit Engine.

* Fixed duplicate servers in sidebar.

System Requirements:

Intel, Mac OS X 10.6 or later

--- PLEASE SEED ---
